text:
Hi,

It appears to me that JDBCAppender is unable to get the actual stack trace of a 
Throwable object send to the .log() method.  The stack trace is appearing for 
other appenders like FileAppender, but not for JDBCAppender.

Thanks,
Mike Liu
creator: mike@javaexpert.org

text:
JDBCAppender is gone in log4j 1.3, and log4j 1.2 is in maintenance-only mode, 
so this issue is irrelevant.
creator: yoavs@computer.org
